评论详情: Love the fit and comfort of these boots.  The block heal makes them easy to walk around in all day.  Stretch top is a nice fit around the legs.  I love them so much I am thinking of getting them in another color.  Highly recommend.

Order a half-size to a size up from your normal size. The heel is solid and stable and the knit is very comfortable and easy to wear even for all day use. Decent support and they're exactly as pictured in the photos.  Great value for the pair and would recommend.

I was hesitant to buy these boots because of the heel, but I’m so glad I did! They’re incredibly comfortable for all-day wear. The heel is sturdy, and the footbed has just the right amount of padding. I’ve worn them for long walks without any discomfort, and they’ve become a staple in my wardrobe.

Cute boots with an overall knit fabric shot through with shiny threads.  These are pull-on boots with a good amount of “give” to the fabric around the calves and ankles making them comfortable for me to wear all day without the fabric digging in to my ankles or constricting my calves - since I have what I consider to be wide calves.  The heels are a good height for all-day normal activity.  Glad to have added these to my boot wardrobe.

评论概述: Cute and comfortable - sweater material is not itchy at all.
评论详情: Highly recommend for a cute date-night outfit!  The glitter material is super comfortable and does not itch at all like you would think.  The only thing keeping it from 5 stars is the sizing. The boot has a pointed toe and so I would order a size smaller than you think thanks to the extra room in the toe.

If you a skinny woman with narrow feet, this gorgeous tall fabric boots are for you. The fit is perfect, this boots hug my legs and doesn't cut my circulation. If you have wide calfs this beautiful boots are not for you. The does stretch but not enough for wide calfs.

Really love these boots! They look absolutely gorgeous! They appear just as the photos, I love the sweater boot aesthetic. The quality seems to be great so far. The only issue is the sizing. These are a bit snug. I usually wear an 8 and while they still fit, I can feel my toes scraping the front. I know I won’t be able to wear them long without getting uncomfortable. The sweater part for me great, which was a pleasant surprise as I have small calves and typically struggle finding boots that fit well on my legs. If you have larger calves then these would not be a good choice.
So cute and comfortable. It’s all about how your style it

评论概述: Knit dress boots that definitely run small
评论详情: I received these boots for free through the Amazon Vine Program. At the time, they were listed at $59.99 after a discount from the original price of $74.99. Shipping was fast, and they arrived in a beautiful box with secure packaging. The boots themselves were in perfect condition upon arrival. I wear a size 8 with narrow feet, but these boots felt very tight, more like a 7.5. Although I hoped the block heel would make them more comfortable, the snug fit really took away any added ease. I don’t think I could wear them for more than a couple of hours without discomfort. Style-wise, they were okay, though the bright tinsel woven into the fabric was more prominent than I expected—personally, I would have preferred them without it. I’d recommend ordering a half or full size up if you want a more comfortable fit. Overall, I found them a bit pricey for what they offer.

评论概述: Order a size up!!!! Beautiful and fit amazing, but run small.
评论详情: Ordered a size 8, but my wife wears a size 7 shoe. So please order a size up if you intend on wearing th k with any kind of socks. Fit nice! No creases or creaking sound coming from the shoes when walking. They're sturdy and well made.

Okay so these run small. I accidentally ordered an 8 and I wear a 7 however these fit me perfectly. It’s a very comfortable fit too! They’re so cute and the quality is amazing so they are worth every penny. I didn’t expect the shimmer to be as pretty as it is.  Another thing for my wide calf girlies, these fit mine so well. The leg part is so stretchy and even with that stretchiness the ankle support is really good. I love these!

Knit boot that hugs the legs comfortably in all the right places. Offers a snug fit yet the boot itself is not overly thick. Boot quality is decent and the style is flattering and can accommodate a variety of looks. Smell is normal, not of any harsh chemicals.

These are nice and cute, different than any other pair of knee-high boots I have. They’re an interesting material, and they have a little bit of glitter/shimmer in there, which makes them very eye-catching. I like the color, it’ll go well with a lot of different things.

Newbella went above and beyond with these boots. They are so cute! I wear a 7 1/2 or 8 depending on how the shoe is made. I went with an 8 in these boots, so glad that I did. These boots are a little snug around the toes, they might be uncomfortable if you have wide feet. I've only worn them around they house but they seem pretty comfortable. I love the look and fit of these boots. I think I want another color! I would purchase again and recommend. I think the price point is reasonable for a pair of nice boots!
They are perfection
Tuve que devolverlas, lloré al regresarlas. Normalmente soy talla 10. Las pedí 11 y aún así me quedaron muy apretadas. Si existiera una talla más grande las compraría sin dudarlo.
Very cute boots! Runs a little narrow but easy to break in. Comfortable for long use and lots of walking!
These boots are so pretty!! Great material and very well made.
They were a gift and the person loved them. The fit and the style they loved!!!
These boots are just nice. They fit perfectly and are comfortable. I love the style and they look great with dresses. Everyone that sees them likes them.

评论概述: LoVe these boots! Probably SIZE DOWN!
评论详情: Insanely cute! Made well, good stitching! The heel is weird at first when you look up close, maybe it looks cheap? But, then you never think about it again! They are comfortable and hold up well! These boots are being worn for nights out walking and dancing! LoVe them! I usually wear an 8, with a little extra room, for these boots I ordered a size down and they fit perfect!
These cowboy boots are really cute.  They are a good length and the stitching looks nice.  They are pretty comfortable and clean easily.  Makes a great gift.

Oh my gosh, I loveeeee these! They arrived in great condition. Fit exactly as expected, and look soooo chic!! I ALWAYS get nervous about ordering shoes online, but these are sturdy quality. I am so happy with them and can't wait to wear them out and about.
These are actually the best pair of white boots I’ve ever had! They fit perfect and exactly what I was looking for!
